body:
Comment 3: 
linux/amd64

The bug322 bug is a bug for r57.2.

$ hg id
9d7967223815 (release-branch.r57) release/release.r57.2
$ cd $GOROOT/test/bugs
$ 6g  bug322.dir/lib.go $ 6g  bug322.dir/main.go
bug322.dir/main.go:19: implicit assignment of unexported field 'x' of lib.T in method
receiver
bug322.dir/main.go:32: implicit assignment of unexported field 'x' of lib.T in method
receiver
$ 

The bug322 bug is promoted to a fixedbug for tip.

$ hg id
fa2d4e363b02 tip
$ cd $GOROOT/test/fixedbugs
$ 6g  bug322.dir/lib.go 
$ 6g  bug322.dir/main.go
$
